name: Seared Tuna Salad With Anchovy Tomato Sauce
recipeCategory: dinner, lunch, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: fish, garlic, new potatoes, spinach, tomato juice, tuna steak, low calorie, low-fat, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 pound tuna steak, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 tomatoes, cored and cut into wedges
1/8 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a medium-size saucepan and cover with cold water. Cook over medium heat until tender, about 12 minutes. Drain, let cool and cut into quarters. Set aside.
Heat a large, heavy-bottomed nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the olive oil. Add the tuna, sear on all sides, about 3 minutes. Set aside. Toss the potatoes, tomatoes and spinach together.

Combine the tomato juice, anchovy fillets, roasted garlic, salt and pepper to taste in a blender. Blend until smooth. Divide the salad among 4 plates. Top each with some of the tuna. Drizzle the sauce over all and serve immediately.
